body:
Comment 5 by **paul@pachube.com**: 
(after a bit of searching)

RFC 2109 (about cookies):

   value           =       word
   word            =       token | quoted-string

RFC 2068:

          token          = 1*<any CHAR except CTLs or tspecials>

          tspecials      = "(" | ")" | "<" | ">" | "@"
                         | "," | ";" | ":" | "\" | <">
                         | "/" | "[" | "]" | "?" | "="
                         | "{" | "}" | SP | HT
